title: Home | Vitalia Mentor
text: PREMIER SENIOR LIVING IN Mentor, OH PREMIER SENIOR LIVING IN Mentor, OH Welcome to VITALIA® Mentor, a spirited living experience in Mentor, OH. This is your time to live loud, proud, and vibrant. We offer an appealing variety of smart-designed floor plans through our assisted living and memory care neighborhoods. Our vibrant community perfectly pairs with luxury amenities and gives you the maintenance-free lifestyle to make every day count. Live VITALIA® is the lifestyle our residents love about our communities. For some, that is playing an active role on our chair beach ball team, through our other onsite events and entertainment, or in the nearby neighborhood. For others, it could mean engaging in a life of leisure or pursuing new skills and crafts along the way. Whichever lifestyle you choose, our team is here to support you living it to the fullest and brightest. VITALIA® Mentor is excited to announce that our community is now open. Located in Mentor, OH, VITALIA® Mentor offers a variety of amenities and services to enhance residents’ daily lives, including fine dining, fitness classes, and social events. Don’t miss out on this amazing opportunity – schedule your visit today and discover all that VITALIA® Mentor has to offer. 8180 Mentor Hills Drive, Mentor, OH, 44060 The The Harbor is VITALIA® Mentor’s full service restaurant, starting with amazing flavors, nutrition, and service. VITALIA® Mentor focuses on personalized-care and a belief in full-body wellness to ensure you or your loved one are living a happy and healthy life. Have it all – the privacy, the care, the adventure. VITALIA® Mentor allows you to personalize your experience and choose the life you deserve. Immerse yourself in a vibrant and fully supported lifestyle at VITALIA® Mentor. Connect with like-minded neighbors, create meaningful relationships, and establish a sense of belonging in a community designed to help you thrive every day. Engage in special events, educational seminars, volunteer programs, and local amenities that enrich your experience and allow you to contribute to the place you proudly call home. With a focus on wellness and safety, at VITALIA® Mentor we create an engaging and lively experience for our residents. We know this mission starts with high-quality team members who believe in enhancing the lives of individuals, honoring veterans, and a passion for working alongside advanced health technology. We do more than provide care, we provide a lifestyle. If that sounds like you, join a group of people who are actively working to become leaders in the community, impacting the lives of others, and implementing change around them. VITALIA® Mentor serves and employs individuals of all faiths, regardless of race, color, gender, sexual orientation, national origin, age or handicap, except as limited by state and federal law.
